name: only one life (NKTN, AndreasKlytta, Okamigaru, ThomasK94, EineErdbeere)
name_original: only one life (NKTN, AndreasKlytta, Okamigaru, ThomasK94, EineErdbeere)
description:
a game about psychological development in a life, including personal growth and crisis

You play only with mouse. Mouse clicks control player movement.

With every artefact you gain the ability to explore new point of views. Change sides and turn your World upside-down with clicks on the UI-Elements on the right. But beware that you have to turn your World at the right places - otherwise it might not work.

Lost your Character? - Try a new Perspective ;)
